title: Chappell Roan - Pink Pony Club (Official Music Video)
description:
Chappell Roan – Pink Pony Club

Download/stream "Pink Pony Club": https://ChappellRoan.lnk.to/PinkPonyClubID
Listen to "The Rise and Fall of a Midwest Princess" now: https://chappellroan.lnk.to/TheRiseandFallofaMidwestPrincess

Lyrics
I know you wanted me to stay 
But I can’t ignore the crazy visions of me in LA
And I heard that there’s a special place
Where boys and girls can all be queens every single day 

I’m having wicked dreams
Of leaving Tennessee 
Oh, Santa Monica 
I swear it’s calling me 

Won’t make my mama proud
It’s gonna cause a scene

I know she’s gonna scream
